messages.message:
Web Developer - Exciting Online Precious Metals Trading Start Up - Danville, CA

Hi Brian, 

I hope this finds you well,

I apologize for disturbing your Sunday and for the length of this mail, wanted to avoid one of those vague "Recruiter Mails" which tells you nothing about the job.

I wanted to reach out because I saw your profile was set to "Open for New Opportunities" and CA was listed as an area you would be interested in.

If this is still the case, I have an immediate requirement for one of my clients, a heavily funded online precious metals start-up in Danville, CA, who are looking for an experienced Web Developer to join them. 

They currently have a live trading platform set up on Shopify however they are looking for someone who can join and build a far superior Wordpress site with greater functionality to support their continued growth and expansion.

The founder is an experienced entrepreneur who already has an impressive portfolio of successful multimillion dollar businesses and you would be working directly with him and the other executives playing a vital part in realizing their ambitions to revolutionize the market.

This position will be primarily working from my client's HQ in Danville, CA however there will be flexibility to work remote once you are embedded and up to speed on the project. 

Desirable technologies (Don't need to be an expert in all of)they are looking for experience with - Wordpress, PHP, CSS, JavaScript, HTML, Adobe Photoshop & Illustrator.

Skype interviews are taking place as soon as the Tuesday the 18th.

Would you be interested in discussing further?

Best Regards,

Matthew Davie
512 501 5798 /m.davie@computerfutures.com

Sorry, I've moved on. Nothing is more fun than writing angular and react, I don't see any reason to look at WordPress again.
